Uses of Class
org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon.DecoratorBusyIcon

Packages that use DecoratorBusyIcon
org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon   
 

Uses of DecoratorBusyIcon in org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon
 

Subclasses of DecoratorBusyIcon in org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon
 class DefaultBusyIcon
          Default BusyIcon implementation that paint an icon and draw on overlay a small progress bar.
 class RadialBusyIcon
          BusyIcon drawing a radial progress bar (circle) below the decorated icon
Some methods can be used for customize the LaF of this icon: setDecoratedIcon(Icon) : Define the basic icon to draw RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarDiameter(int) : Define the diameter of the progress bar (the bar is centered on this icon) RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarThickness(int) : Define the thickness of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarBackground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the background color of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarForeground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the foreground color of the progress bar Theses methods defines some customization of the LaF's icon.
